sqlMap.select:
select t.emp_id as userId, t.emp_code as loginId, t.emp_name as userName, t.emp_state as userState, t.org_id as orgId, b.org_name as orgName, t.emp_phone as phone, t.emp_mobile_phone as mobile, t.emp_email as email, t.emp_address as address, t.emp_sex as sex, t.bus_mobilephone as BusMobilephone, t.emp_psd as passWd, t.rtx_code as rtx_LoginId from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info t left join basis.basis_tb_org b on t.org_id=b.org_id where t.emp_state <> 'D' and t.emp_state<>'W' and t.emp_state<>'R' and t.emp_code is not null
t.emp_email =#email#
t.emp_code like #loginId,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.emp_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.org_id = #orgId#
t.org_id in #orgIds[]#

select t.emp_id as userId, t.emp_code as loginId, t.emp_name as userName, t.emp_state as userState, t.org_id as orgId, b.org_name as orgName, t.emp_phone as phone, t.emp_mobile_phone as mobile, t.emp_email as email, t.emp_address as address, t.emp_sex as sex, t.bus_mobilephone as BusMobilephone, t.emp_psd as passWd, t.rtx_code as rtx_LoginId from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info t left join basis.basis_tb_org b on t.org_id=b.org_id where t.emp_state <> 'D' and t.emp_state<>'R' and t.emp_state<>'N' and t.emp_code is not null
t.emp_email =#email#
t.emp_code like #loginId,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.emp_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.org_id = #orgId#
t.org_id in #orgIds[]#

select count(t.emp_id) from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info t left join basis.basis_tb_org b on t.org_id=b.org_id where t.emp_state <> 'D' and t.emp_state<>'N' and t.emp_state<>'R' and t.emp_code is not null
t.emp_code like #loginId,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.emp_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.org_id = #orgId#
t.org_id in #orgIds[]#

select distinct a.emp_id as userId, a.emp_name as userName, a.org_id as orgId, a.emp_sex as sex, c.station_name as posName from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info a left join basis.basis_tb_station_user b on a.emp_id = b.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_stations c on b.station_id = c.station_id where a.emp_state in('S','Y') and a.org_id = #org_id#
sqlMap.update: update basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info b set b.emp_state='D',b.last_modify = sysdate where b.emp_id=#userId#
sqlMap.select: select t.cust_type as custType, t.passwd as passWd, t.login_id as loginId, t.mobile, t.phone, t.email, t.user_state as userState, t.user_id as userId, t.user_name as userName, t.hq_sign as hqSign, t.org_id as orgId, t.isoffice_sign as isOffice, t.expiredpsw as expiredpsw, t.kunnr_sign as kunnrSign from basis.basis_vw_user_psw t where (t.login_id = #passport# or (t.mobile = #passport# and t.cust_type = 'X') or (t.phone = #passport# and t.cust_type = 'X')) and t.user_state in ('S', 'Y')

select distinct t.cust_type as custType, t.passwd as passWd, t.login_id as loginId, t.mobile, t.bus_mobilephone , t.phone, t.email, t.user_state as userState, t.user_id as userId, t.user_name as userName, t.hq_sign as hqSign, t.org_id as orgId, t.isoffice_sign as isOffice, t.expiredpsw as expiredpsw, t.kunnr_sign as kunnrSign from basis.basis_vw_user_psw t where 1=1 and t.user_state in ('S', 'Y')
t.mobile =#mobile#
t.bus_mobilephone =#busMobilephone#
sqlMap.update:
update basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info t set t.last_modify = sysdate, t.emp_psd = #passWd#
where t.emp_email = #email#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from basis.basis_vw_user_psw t where (t.login_id = #loginId# or (t.mobile = #loginId# and t.cust_type = 'X') or (t.phone = #loginId# and t.cust_type = 'X')) and t.user_state in ('S','Y','W')

select count(s.emp_code) from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info s where s.emp_state in('S','Y')
s.emp_code =#loginId#

select b.emp_code as loginId, b.emp_name as userName, b.emp_sex as sex, b.emp_psd as passWd, b.emp_start_date as startDate, b.org_id as orgId, o.org_name as orgName, b.emp_id_card as idCard, b.emp_workfax as workFax, b.emp_email as email, b.emp_phone as phone, b.emp_mobile_phone as busMobilephone, b.st_mobile as mobileSimple, b.emp_remark as remark, b.emp_address as address£¬ b.emp_post_id as empPostId, b.hq_sign as hqSign, b.rtx_code as rtx_LoginId, e.emp_post_id as empPostId, e.emp_post_name as empPostName from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info b left join basis.basis_tb_org o on b.org_id = o.org_id left join basis.basis_tb_emp_post e on e.emp_post_id = b.emp_post_id where b.emp_id= #ids#

select s.emp_code as loginId, s.emp_name as userName, s.emp_email as email from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info s where s.emp_state in('S','Y')
s.emp_code =#loginId#

select s.emp_code as loginId, s.emp_name as userName, s.emp_email as email from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info s where s.emp_state in ('S','Y')
s.emp_code =#loginId#
select b.emp_name from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info b where b.emp_id=#userId#
sqlMap.update: update basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info b set b.emp_state=#userState#,b.last_modify=sysdate where b.emp_id=#userId#
update basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info b set b.org_id=#orgId#,b.last_modify=sysdate where b.emp_id=#userId#
sqlMap.select: select distinct t.emp_id as userId, t.emp_code as loginId, t.emp_name as userName, t.emp_showname as userShowName, t.emp_id_card as idCard, t.emp_phone as phone, t.emp_workfax as workFax, t.emp_mobile_phone as mobile, t.emp_homephone as homePhone, t.emp_start_date as startDate, t.emp_address as address, t.emp_email as email, t.emp_sex as sex, c.station_name as posName, t.havemail as haveMail, t.emp_remark as remark, t.org_id as orgId, t.emp_shortmsgbook as empShortmsgbook, t.sms_usertype_id as smsUserTypeId, t.charge_id as chargeId , t.bus_mobilephone as busMobilephone, t.supplier_number as supplierNumber, t.emp_shortmsgbook as empShortmsgbook, t.sms_usertype_id as smsUserTypeId, t.charge_id as chargeId, t.bus_mobilephone as busMobilephone, t.rtx_code as rtx_LoginId from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info t left join basis.basis_tb_station_user b on t.emp_id = b.user_id and b.is_main_station='Y' left join basis.basis_tb_stations c on b.station_id = c.station_id where t.emp_state in('S','Y') and t.emp_id = #empId#
sqlMap.update: update basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info b set b.org_id=#orgId#, b.emp_email=#email#, b.emp_mobile_phone=#busMobilephone#, b.st_mobile=#mobileSimple#, b.emp_address=#address#, b.emp_start_date = #startDate#, b.emp_sex=#sex#, b.emp_id_card=#idCard#, b.emp_phone =#phone#, b.emp_remark =#remark#, b.emp_workfax = #workFax#, b.last_modify= sysdate, b.emp_post_id=#empPostId#, b.hq_sign=#hqSign# where b.emp_id=#userId#

update basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info t set t.last_modify =sysdate
t.emp_psd =#passWd#
where t.emp_id =#userId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into basis.BASIS_TB_LOGINLOG(LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_DATE) values (#loginId#,#ip#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:ss'))
sqlMap.select: select t.org_id from basis.basis_tb_station_user t where t.user_id =#userId#

select t.emp_id as userId, t.emp_code as loginId, t.emp_name as userName, t.emp_state as userState, t.org_id as orgId, c.name1 as orgName, t.emp_phone as phone, t.emp_mobile_phone as mobile, t.emp_email as email, t.emp_address as address, t.emp_sex as sex, t.bus_mobilephone as BusMobilephone, t.emp_psd as passWd, t.lifnr as isOffice, t.staff_nubmer as staffNubmer from basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr c on t.lifnr=c.kunnr where t.emp_state <> 'D' and t.emp_state<>'W' and t.emp_state<>'R' and t.emp_code is not null
t.emp_email =#email#
t.emp_code like #loginId,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.emp_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.lifnr =#isOffice#
t.org_id in(select o.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.state = 'Y' start with o.org_id = #orgId# connect by nocycle prior o.org_id = o.org_parent_id )
t.bus_mobilephone =#busMobilephone#
c.name1 like #orgName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'

select t.kunnr as loginId, t.org_id as orgId from crm.crm_tb_kunnr t left join basis.basis_tb_org b on t.org_id=b.org_id where t.status <> '2' and t.status <> '3' and t.kunnr is not null
t.emp_code like #loginId,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.org_id = #orgId#
t.org_id in #orgIds[]#

select count(t.emp_id) from basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr c on t.lifnr=c.kunnr where t.emp_state <> 'D' and t.emp_state<>'W' and t.emp_state<>'R' and t.emp_code is not null
t.emp_code like #loginId,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.emp_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.lifnr =#isOffice#
t.org_id in(select o.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.state = 'Y' start with o.org_id = #orgId# connect by nocycle prior o.org_id = o.org_parent_id )
t.bus_mobilephone =#busMobilephone#
c.name1 like #orgName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT basis.basis_seq_emp.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
insert into basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info (emp_id, org_id, emp_name, emp_id_card, emp_code, emp_sex, emp_phone, bus_mobilephone, emp_start_date, emp_state, emp_remark, last_modify, emp_address, modify_date, emp_psd, emp_email, emp_workfax, paswd_sign_Date, emp_mobile_phone, hq_sign, lifnr, STAFF_NUBMER ) values (#id#, #orgId#, #userName#, #idCard#, #loginId#, #sex#, #phone#, #busMobilephone#, #startDate#, #userState#, #remark#, sysdate, #address#, sysdate, #passWd#, #email#, #workFax#, sysdate, #mobile#, #hqSign#, #isOffice#, #staffNubmer# )
sqlMap.select: select b.emp_code as loginId, b.emp_name as userName, b.emp_sex as sex, b.emp_psd as passWd, b.emp_start_date as startDate, b.org_id as orgId, b.emp_id_card as idCard, b.emp_workfax as workFax, b.emp_email as email, b.emp_phone as phone, b.bus_mobilephone as busMobilephone, b.emp_mobile_phone as mobile, b.emp_remark as remark, b.emp_address as address£¬ b.emp_post_id as empPostId, b.hq_sign as hqSign, b.LIFNR as isOffice, b.staff_nubmer as staffNubmer from basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info b where b.emp_id= #ids#
sqlMap.update: update basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info b set b.emp_email=#email#, b.emp_mobile_phone=#mobile#, b.bus_mobilephone=#busMobilephone#, b.emp_address = #address#, b.emp_start_date = #startDate#, b.emp_sex=#sex#, b.emp_id_card=#idCard#, b.emp_phone =#phone#, b.emp_remark =#remark#, b.emp_workfax = #workFax#, b.LIFNR = #isOffice#, b.STAFF_NUBMER = #staffNubmer#, b.last_modify= sysdate where b.emp_id=#userId#
update basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info t set t.last_modify =sysdate ,t.expiredpsw='A' ,t.emp_psd =#passWd# where t.emp_id =#userId#
update basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info b set b.emp_state=#userState#,b.last_modify=sysdate where b.emp_id=#userId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT basis.basis_seq_user_role.nextval AS id FROM DUAL
insert into basis.basis_tb_user_role values (#id#, #userId#, #posName#, '', sysdate,TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'),to_date('9999-01-01','yyyy-MM-dd'),'U')
sqlMap.select:
select count(t.kunnr) from crm.crm_tb_kunnr t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnrbusiness b on t.kunnr=b.kunnr where 1=1
t.kunnr=#kunnr#
t.name1 like #name1,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.channel_Id =#channelId#
t.status =#status#
b.business_Manager like #businessManager,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
b.business_Competent like #businessCompetent,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.org_id =#orgId#
t.org_id in(select o.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.state = 'Y' start with o.org_id = #orgId# connect by nocycle prior o.org_id = o.org_parent_id )

select t.kunnr, t.name1, t.name3, t.mob_number mobNumber, c.channel_name channelName, t.konzs, t.kp_phone kpPhone, t.province,t.city,t.area,t.town, z.zwl01t||z.zwl02t||z.zwl03t||z.zwl04t||t.street1 street1, z.zwl01t||z.zwl02t||z.zwl03t||z.zwl04t||t.street1 bgXzAddress, t.tel_number telNumber, t.fax_number faxNumber, t.locco, t.bukrs, b.werks, t.bank, t.bank_account bankAccount, t.health_number healthNumber, t.BUSINESS_LICENSE businessLicense, t.stceg, b.business_Manager businessManager, b.MANAGER_MOBILE managerMobile, b.business_Competent businessCompetent, b.COMPETENT_MOBILE competentMobile, z1.zwl01t||z1.zwl02t||z1.zwl03t||z1.zwl04t||t.street as street, t.name102, t.name102tel, t.name102mob, t.maximum as maximum, d.item_value as maximumTxt, b.LASTYEAR_SALES lastyearSales, b.THEYEAR_SALES theyearSales, b.COVER_AREA coverArea, t.status, b.kunnr_leader as kunnrLeader, b.kunnr_phone as kunnrPhone, t.warehouse_area as warehouseArea, t.nature_enterprise as natureEnterprise, t.fp_recipient as fpRecipient, t.fp_address as fpAddress, t.fp_contact_phone as fpContactPhone, t.org_id as orgId, t.org_name as orgName, t.zc_address as zcAddress, z1.zwl01 as shProvince, z1.zwl02 as shCity, z1.zwl03 as shArea, t.sh_town as shTown, z1.zwl01t||z1.zwl02t||z1.zwl03t||z1.zwl04t as shXzAddress from crm.crm_tb_kunnr t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnrbusiness b on t.kunnr=b.kunnr left join crm.crm_tb_channel c on t.channel_Id=c.channel_Id left join crm.crm_tb_zwlqy z on t.town=z.zwl04 left join crm.crm_tb_zwlqy z1 on t.sh_town=z1.zwl04 left join crm.crm_tb_dict d on d.item_name=t.maximum and d.item_state='U' left join crm.crm_tb_dict_type p on p.dict_type_id=d.dict_type_id and d.item_state='U' and p.dict_type_value='×î´ó¿ÉÍ¨ÐÐ³µÐÍ' where 1=1
t.kunnr=#kunnr#
t.name1 like #name1,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.channel_Id =#channelId#
t.status =#status#
t.org_id =#orgId#
t.org_id in(select o.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.state = 'Y' start with o.org_id = #orgId# connect by nocycle prior o.org_id = o.org_parent_id )
sqlMap.update: update crm.crm_tb_kunnr k set k.mob_number=#mobile# where k.kunnr=#isOffice#
